tags: they shouldn't be this hard to draw
summary:
They go to school together ❤
Hero!Tenko (who was raised like he should've been) is a grade above Takako. He's second in his...
body:
They go to school together ❤

Hero!Tenko (who was raised like he should’ve been) is a grade above Takako. He’s second in his class and popular in that “pretty face, sour attitude” kind of way. His temper gets him into trouble (see: bruised knuckles and bandaged face). Takako always has lunch with him and always ends up stealing some of his food. She jokingly calls him senpai because it makes him blush.

Not really jazzed about Takako’s bangs (still figuring out the mechanics of those blunt, straight across bangs, y'all) but this is top 5 in the ‘cutest things I’ve ever drawn’ category. Meet Takako in this fic.

summary:
Sakura Haruno is Ojiro Mashirao's cousin au
So I noticed how similar Mebuki Haruno and Ojiro Mashirao's hairstyle is and I...
body:
Sakura Haruno is Ojiro Mashirao’s cousin au

So I noticed how similar Mebuki Haruno and Ojiro Mashirao’s hairstyle is and I decided they are related.

Mebuki is the older sister of Ojiro’s mom. The sister married a guy who had a mutant quirk which gives us Ojiro (quirks can be inherited from only one parent).

Mebuki married Kizashi Haruno who is from a large family, so Sakura has a lot of cousins on that side of the family. They’re spread all over the world, though, so Sakura only sees them on major holidays.

The Haruno family runs an international corporation, so they’re well off.

Whenever Sakura’s parents have to go on a business trip, she’s left with the Mashirao family. Ojiro and Sakura basically become brother and sister to each other.

Ojiro is also the one to protect Sakura from the bullies, because she’s a late bloomer when it comes to getting a quirk.

When Ojiro starts lessons at the dojo Sakura tags along and becomes really good at it wth Ojiro. When those two team up, they’re impossible to beat.

Sakura doesn’t have enough confidence to be a hero with her quirk, though, so she applies to the general education department at UA while Ojiro applies for the hero department.

However, she ends up really impressing people during the Sports Festival with her intelligence and fighting skills and gets transferred to the hero department. She definitely starts shadowing Recovery Girl after seeing how often people gets hurt.

summary: I just finished watching My Hero Academia and woah. I really didn’t think it was going to be that good. I thought It was going...
body:
I just finished watching My Hero Academia and woah.

I really didn’t think it was going to be that good. I thought It was going to be some funny but a little stupid very cliche anime, and I’m sure you know what I mean. People had told me it was okayish, BUT THEY WERE WRONG.

I took my chances, and I started watching it. At first, I was a little suspicious. After watching five episodes, I almost stopped watching. But as the season went on, it kept getting better and I kept getting more addicted to it!

And w o w…

It was pretty incredible. 8.5/10

summary: AH! So happy that we had such a big pile this week, it shouldn’t come as any surprise considering how popular Aizawa is! This...
caption:
AH! So happy that we had such a big pile this week, it shouldn’t come as any surprise considering how popular Aizawa is! This pile marks a very special occasion, our server has been running for 6 months now, to celebrate the occasion we’re going to have a very special pile in a week’s time, hope to see you all there!

Don’t forget to check out our incredible artists, all of their links are listed below!!

PLUS ULTRA!!

@bs-receptors

imitationpie

@i-write-wins-not-tragedies

@mulletprince

@mylondinium

@narrettwist-art

@professor-spacecakes

@sevivilis

starsailorart

@yukim-art-blog

blog.description: things that were 100% definitely said in boku no hero academia. not spoiler free. tracking the tag #incorrectbnhaquotes. submissions open!

summary: Iida: The insult “bird brain” completely ignores the fact that many birds migrate thousands of miles and back with no maps,...
body:
Iida: The insult “bird brain” completely ignores the fact that many birds migrate thousands of miles and back with no maps, build nests and shelter from nothing and if they’re crows, use the tires of moving vehicles to crack open nuts, all things that take a decent level of intelligence to do.
Bakugou: Ok birdbrain

dialogue.name: Iida
dialogue.label: Iida:
dialogue.phrase: The insult “bird brain” completely ignores the fact that many birds migrate thousands of miles and back with no maps, build nests and shelter from nothing and if they’re crows, use the tires of moving vehicles to crack open nuts, all things that take a decent level of intelligence to do.
